title: Malzahar's voidling's need to be worse vs epic monsters, but not regular monsters.
body: Lets be honest, the problem with his current voidlings isn't his jungle clear, but his ability to effortlessly solo Baron, Dragon, and Herald. I don't want to see his ability to jungle drastically slashed in attempt to address his cheesing of team objectives regardless of if he's jungling our not.

replies.body: actually i want his jungle to be slashed so his laning can be buffed. malzahar shouldnt be made for jungle. he is suppose to be a mid anti-assassin.

>
> actually i want his jungle to be slashed so his laning can be buffed. malzahar shouldnt be made for jungle. he is suppose to be a mid anti-assassin.

Why? It is fun to have some freedom and not be confined to one role.

> [{quoted}](name=xdeviltwinkiex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xJR5WAxx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-06T18:46:31.614+0000)
>
> Why? It is fun to have some freedom and not be confined to one role.

dont be hypocritical. his laning is now trash and his only option is jungle.
Or ya know, Ward the objective and go stop him? Like... seriously, people complain about everything.
Except it's extremely difficult to do so that early when no one has any wards outside of the one trinket use which has a very limited use time frame.
I can see the issue with that, but any good jungler, will go to take scuttle right after taking their buff or wraiths/wolves, so you have the vision from that to stop it.

You can't take scuttle after your first buff clear with nearly every jungler (Malz being the big exception) Even dragon is hard to do that soon without the ADC's help which would be noticed when they're gone from the lane.
I have 0 problems taking scuttle after getting a buff, it isn't hard, deals 0 damage. It just takes a little while to do.

,The problem lies in Riot's inability to properly nerf things logically. 

They have SEEN this problem on the PBE but it STILL went through. Why?

Riot, you need to get your shit together. Voidlings should only deal 15% damage to epic monsters at rank 1.

And from there you just increase it by however much percent you want. So a Level 2 or 3 cheese Dragon will NOT happen considering how valuable 3 of the 5 Drakes actually are.
I agree - either that or have a max amount of voidling spawns available where new ones simply replace the old for a set period. You wouldn't need 10+ voidlings for a regular camp.
